jobs.title: Middle PHP Developer (Laravel)
jobs.description: HomeServicesAbout usShowcaseBlogsClientsContactCareersService RequestMiddle PHP Developer (Laravel)BackResponsibilities– Develop and optimize backend systems for web applications using Laravel.– Design, develop, and maintain standardRESTfulorGraphQLAPIs to support frontend and mobile apps.– Optimize system performance, databases, and application security.– Participate in requirements analysis, system design, evaluation, and propose technical solutions.– Collaborate closely with frontend develope...
requirements: – Participate in requirements analysis, system design, evaluation, and propose technical solutions
RequirementsMust-have:– Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or completion of intensive coding bootcamps
– 2–4 years of experience developing web applications using PHP (preferably Laravel)
– Hands-on experience with databases such asMySQLorPostgreSQL
– Basic English communication skills (ability to read and understand technical documentation)
Nice-to-have:– Experience with frontend frameworks such asVue
– Creative work environment that supports AI skill development

jobs.title: Senior Java Developer
jobs.description: HomeServicesAbout usShowcaseBlogsClientsContactCareersService RequestSenior Java DeveloperBackResponsibilities– Design, develop, and maintain scalable and high-performance backend services using Java (8+) and modern JVM technologies.– Take end-to-end ownership of the software development lifecycle: from requirements and technical design to deployment and monitoring.– Collaborate with cross-functional teams in an agile, flat organizational structure.– Contribute to the design and implementation o...
requirements: – Take end-to-end ownership of the software development lifecycle: from requirements and technical design to deployment and monitoring

– Have 8+ years of hands-on experience in backend software development– Experience in modern JVM, Java 8+– Experience in Relational Database– Experience in Microservices Architecture– Well-versed in Git/Gitlab and CD/CI concepts, tools and pipelines– Experience in the development of mission-critical software systems– Experience in designing and building performant systems– Abstract thinking skills and academic level in computer science or other engineering studies– Experience in Workflow Engines, Kafka is a plus– Good verbal and written English communication skills– Strong team player and experienced working with teams on and across sites

– Experience working with Docker and Kubernetes in a production environment is a plus– Exposure to Virtualization / Cloud platforms such as Azure, AWS or GCP is a plus– Experience in language engineering is a plusBenefits:Salary & Allowances:– Salary:negotiable
– Sponsorship for advanced training and professional skill enhancement
